vecHighlight.strDescription: Kill at least 4 players in a single match.
Kill 10 players with a shotgun, a submachine gun, and/or a pistol.
Wear the outfit of a dead player.
Kill a player by any means.

vecUnachieved.strDescription: Charge your boost gauge to the max with energy drink and painkiller overdose.
Reach the top 10 without killing anyone.
Kill 10 players with an assault rifle and/or a sniper rifle from over 100 meters away.
Obtain a Chicken Dinner in Squads.
Kill 30 players with an assault rifle and/or a sniper rifle from over 100 meters away.

vecUnachieved.strName: Now You See Me, Now You Don't
vecUnachieved.strDescription: Equip a ghillie suit for the first time.
Get the first kill of a match.
Jump out from an airplane 101 times.
Obtain a Chicken Dinner in Duos.
Kill 100 players with an assault rifle and/or a sniper rifle from over 100 meters away.

data.strFullDescription:
[b]LAND, LOOT, SURVIVE![/b]
Play PUBG: BATTLEGROUNDS for free.
Land on strategic locations, loot weapons and supplies, and survive to become the last team standing across various, diverse Battlegrounds.
Squad up and join the Battlegrounds for the original Battle Royale experience that only PUBG: BATTLEGROUNDS can offer.

This content download will also provide access to the BATTLEGROUNDS Test Server, which requires a separate download to play. 
Optional in-game purchases available.
data.strSnippet: Play PUBG: BATTLEGROUNDS for free. Land on strategic locations, loot weapons and supplies, and survive to become the last team standing across various, diverse Battlegrounds. Squad up and join the Battlegrounds for the original Battle Royale experience that only PUBG: BATTLEGROUNDS can offer.
